title: UI: Kanban board layout
description:
HTML/CSS kanban board with 6 columns:
- Backlog, Agent Queue, Needs Review, Needs Input, Rejected, Done
- Responsive flexbox layout
- Column headers with count badges
- Scrollable columns
- Use Catppuccin Mocha color palette

AGENT VERIFICATION:
- Use agent-browser to navigate to http://localhost:3000
- Verify 6 columns render with headers
- Verify empty state message in each column
- Take screenshot

HUMAN REVIEW:
- URL: http://localhost:3000
- Verify layout looks clean and professional
- Check colors match Catppuccin Mocha
